lines.text: [C.J. comes face-to-face with the Devil sitting on a throne in a white-colored limbo plane of existence]

[chuckles]
Forgive me, but you are an endless source of amusement to me.
What is it that you want?
There... you see what I mean? After all I put you through and you still don't know.

No, Mr. Arnold. YOU did. You denied the warnings, you opened the door, and still you cannot accept or understand what you've done. You pondered the deeper meaning of a universal power for good. Self made.
What is it that you want from me?

My accounts. I fill my accounts. You have a will, Mr. Arnold. Strong, sometimes misdirected, but a will. So you have some value even among your kind. By the way, where is that piece of holy excrement that you used to open the door? The cross?
It's a thing of God. How could it come here? What could you want with it?

[stern tone]
Don't question me. I have little enough patience. That "thing" shall be destroyed and you are going to see it done. Where is it?
